extension.summary: Watch the latest shows from DR.dk/nu
Se de seneste udsendelser fra DR.dk/nu
extension.description: All programs that DR has the rights to show on the internet is available in DR NU. The typically means DR's own programs, news, sports and magazine - but usually not movies and some international tv-shows.[CR][CR]If you have comments or suggestions for this addon, please feel free to participate in the debate on my blog at http://tommy.winther.nu

Alle de programmer, DR har rettigheder til at vise på nettet, vil være at finde i DR NU. Dette gælder typisk DR's egne programmer, nyheder, sport og magasiner - men typisk ikke film og visse udenlandske tv-serier.[CR][CR]Har du kommentarer, ris eller ros til denne addon er du velkommen til at deltage i debatten på min blog på http://tommy.winther.nu

extension.summary: Documentary Network - Watch free documentaries online
extension.description: Documentary.net offers free and legal streaming of documentary films from all around the world. We crawl the web and curate the best documentaries from various sources like YouTube, Vimeo etc. Most films are available worldwide.[CR][CR]The content on Documentary.net is generated by thousands of professional content producers and TV-stations who provide their films on the internet for free. You can browse the films by category, topic or film length.

extension.description: This plugin allows UK users to view free-to-air channels on XBMC courtesy of TVCatchup.com
extension.disclaimer: This plugin is provided as is. Although all attempts will be made to help resolve issues, no promises can be made. Please note: You must hold a valid TV Licence and be within the UK Borders to use this plugin. Use of VPN's to attempt to bypass geo-blocking is not allowed and will be blocked. By using this plugin you are agreeing to the sites terms of service. A copy o thse can be found in License.txt

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.

extension.summary: Watch videos and the live stream from Al Jazeera English.
extension.description: Drawing on the legacy of the groundbreaking Al Jazeera Arabic channel, Al Jazeera English was launched on November 15, 2006 to more than 80 million households worldwide.[CR][CR] The 24-hour news and current affairs channel is the first international English-language news channel to broadcast across the globe from the Middle East.[CR][CR] Al Jazeera's global footprint continues to grow and now broadcasts to more than 220 million households on six continents in more than 100 countries.[CR][CR] Our channel is broadcast from four strategic broadcast centres: Doha, Kuala Lumpur, London, and Washington DC. Unlike other international channels, we broadcast from our different centres, as the world turns, providing the most comprehensive and contextual news coverage.[CR][CR] Our mission is to provide independent, impartial news for an international audience and to offer a voice to a diversity of perspectives from under-reported regions.[CR][CR] In addition, the channel aims to balance the information flow between the South and the North.[CR][CR] The channel of reference for the Middle East and Africa, Al Jazeera has unique access to some of the world’s most troubled and controversial locations. Our determination and ability to accurately reflect the truth on the ground in regions torn by conflict and poverty has set our content apart.[CR][CR] Source: Al Jazeera

Stream a selection of the Danish live channels, including all of DRs channel, some of the TV2/Regions channel, Kanal Sport and Folketinget TV.[CR][CR]If you have comments or suggestions for this addon, please feel free to participate in the debate on my blog at http://tommy.winther.nu

Stream en række danske live kanaler, bl.a. alle DRs kanaler, en del af TV2/Regionernes kanaler samt Kanal Sport og Folketingets kanal.[CR][CR]Har du kommentarer, ris eller ros til denne addon er du velkommen til at deltage i debatten på min blog på http://tommy.winther.nu

extension.summary: Common caching api for xbmc plugins.
Watch TV and listen to radio from the BBC's iPlayer website
extension.description: This XBMC plugin enables (UK only) the playing of TV and Radio catchup content from the BBC IPlayer website. Live radio and TV feeds are also supported.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: Радио TuneIn е безплатна услуга, която ви позволява да слушате всичко, независимо къде се намирате. Каквото желаете - музика, спорт или новини. Радио TuneIn предлага над 50 000 станции от които да избирате. Можете да намерите местните станции или да откриете нови станции от целия свят. Радио TuneIn ви отвежда точно където желаете да сте.

TuneIn Radio is a free service that lets you listen to anything in the world from wherever you are. Whether you want to hear music, sports, news or current events. TuneIn Radio offers over 50,000 stations for you to choose from. From finding local stations to discovering new stations from around the world, TuneIn Radio brings you to where you want to be.

TuneIn Radio es un servicio gratuito que te permite escuchar cualquier cosa del mundo desde donde te encuentres. Si deseas escuchar música, deportes, noticias o eventos actuales. TuneIn Radio ofrece más de 50,000 estaciones radiales para escoger, desde estaciones locales hasta descubrir nuevas estaciones alrededor del mundo, TuneIn Radio te lleva a donde tu quieras estar.
A collection of the best online videos. Our editors make sure clips added are family friendly.

extension.summary: Best and worst from DR's archives
Det bedste og værste fra DR's arkiver

16. januar 2008 åbnede DR for sit store arkiv med Bonanza. Her kan du se lidt af det bedste - og værste af det, der er blevet produceret i årenes løb.

extension.description: Notepad

... presents a cross section of the most popular and obscure games for the C64 sorted by year of release all of which superseed the videos of THE ORIGINAL SERIES. Any questions concerning the archive are most likey answered in the FAQ. If you want more info on a game before downloading the video just click on the lemon to go the the game's detail page over at Lemon 64. If you want to contribute please check out which game videos are still wanted or have been submitted already.
